results.overview: Marcus and Mike are forced to confront new threats, career changes, and midlife crises as they join the newly created elite team AMMO of the Miami police department to take down the ruthless Armando Armas, the vicious leader of a Miami drug cartel.
results.title: Bad Boys for Life

results.original_title: Bad Boys for Life: Ply Festival DVD 2004
results.overview: Bad-boy rockers The Bones, Demented Are Go, Damnation and Die Hunns (with Duane Peters, U.S. Bombs, Corey Parks and Nashville Pussy) detonate the stage with their hard-driving sounds in this concert film of the 2004 Where the Bad Boys Rock Tour. Tracks include "Pumpin' Gas, Denial, Home Sweet Hell, Chrome," "Love Seeps Like a Festering Sore," "Sickness of Truth," "Swine," "California Demons," "Time Has Come Today" and more.
results.title: Bad Boys for Life: Ply Festival DVD 2004
